Uses of Package
com.fortify.client.fod.connection

  • Packages that use com.fortify.client.fod.connection 
    Package Description
    com.fortify.bugtracker.src.fod.connection
    This package contains single class for instantiating FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection instances based on connection properties provided by a given Context instance.
    com.fortify.client.fod.api  
    com.fortify.client.fod.api.query
    The FoDEntityQuery class in this package is the main class for performing FoD-related queries.
    com.fortify.client.fod.api.query.builder
    This package provides various builder classes used to configure REST queries and building a corresponding FoDEntityQuery instance.
    com.fortify.client.fod.connection
    This package provides the main functionality for accessing the FoD REST API.
  • Classes in com.fortify.client.fod.connection used by com.fortify.bugtracker.src.fod.connection 
    Class and Description
    FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection
    This class provides an authenticated REST connection for FoD.
  • Classes in com.fortify.client.fod.connection used by com.fortify.client.fod.api 
    Class and Description
    FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection
    This class provides an authenticated REST connection for FoD.
  • Classes in com.fortify.client.fod.connection used by com.fortify.client.fod.api.query 
    Class and Description
    FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection
    This class provides an authenticated REST connection for FoD.
  • Classes in com.fortify.client.fod.connection used by com.fortify.client.fod.api.query.builder 
    Class and Description
    FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection
    This class provides an authenticated REST connection for FoD.
  • Classes in com.fortify.client.fod.connection used by com.fortify.client.fod.connection 
    Class and Description
    FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection
    This class provides an authenticated REST connection for FoD.
    FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection.FoDAuthenticatingRestConnectionBuilder
    This class provides a builder pattern for configuring an FoDAuthenticatingRestConnection instance.
    FoDBasicRestConnection
    This class provides a basic, non-authenticating REST connection for FoD.
    FoDRestConnectionConfig
    This class extends AbstractRestConnectionWithUsernamePasswordConfig, adding functionality for configuring an FoD tenant (in addition to configuring FoD user name and password as provided by our superclass), or configuring FoD client id and client secret.
    IFoDConnectionRetriever
    Marker interface that extends IRestConnectionRetriever to differentiate from other (non-FoD) connection retrievers, for example when using auto-wiring.
